food.name: Palak paneer
food.description: Fresh spinach leaves (palak) cooked with cubes of Paneer cheese in a rich and creamy tomato-based sauce.

food.name: Biryani
food.description: A fragrant and flavorful Indian rice dish cooked with aromatic spices, herbs, and marinated meat or vegetables

food.name: Masala Dosa
food.description: A crispy, thin rice crepe filled with a spiced potato mixture, often served with coconut chutney and sambar

food.name: Chole Bhature
food.description: Chicken marinated in yogurt and a blend of spices, cooked in a tandoor (clay oven) for a smoky, charred flavor

food.name: Tandoori Chicken
food.description: Chicken marinated in yogurt and spices and roasted in a tandoor, a cylindrical clay oven
